roleset.name: (become) the color red

roles.note: arg2 expected to be particulare to adjectival rels

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is red

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl, redden.01.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Skin : stage two pressure ulcer of coccyx , bilateral involvement of the buttocks , it is red and blanchable
